CREATE TABLE category ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, color VARCHAR(255) );
CREATE TABLE task ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, description VARCHAR(255), start_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, end_time TIMESTAMP, email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, pause_time INT, pause_start TIMESTAMP, category_id UUID, CONSTRAINT fk_category FOREIGN KEY(category_id) REFERENCES category(id) ON DELETE SET NULL );
